name: observably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that can be noticed or seen: The days are becoming observably longer. Their reactions were observably different. See
observe
More examplesFewer examplesThis kind of neediness is observably present in many people.There are wage gaps between observably identical workers.Observably, the mobile phone has enhanced the social life of the campus.
